name: backend
description: API para registrar e listar transações PIX
author: Antonio Carlos

scripts.db:create: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run db:reset
scripts.predev: npm run build && npm run db:create
